Type.Name: ClipboardGetFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ClipboardGetFunc(Clipboard clipboard, SelectionData selection_data, uint info);
.class public auto ansi sealed ClipboardGetFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate for a function to call when getting data from the clipboard.
